item.title: GARLIC DILL PICKLES 🫙🥒 homemade goodness that is so easy to make, rich in probiotics & good bacteria and so beneficial for your gut! ❤️ The base recipe is just cucumbers, water and salt but feel free to add garlic, dill, spicy peppers or peppercorns. • IN
